about.line1: I am a versatile person with experience in various fields. But when it comes to my passion, it is development.
about.line2: My experience in development, combined with my natural skills and strong interest, makes me a qualified candidate for development-related jobs. I am self-driven and like to work both in teams and individually, with the ability to take initiative and deliver results.
about.line3: I speak fluent Arabic and have good skills in both English and Swedish, which gives me an advantage when it comes to communicating effectively.

frontend.title: Frontend Developer – Ongoing
frontend.frontendTech: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, shadcn, TanStack Query
frontend.backendTech: Express.js, SQL, C#, Web API, Entity Framework Core

items.itSupport: IT support and IT management within M365
items.sharepoint: SharePoint Online and SharePoint Admin Center
items.powerPlatform: Power Platform (Power Automate, Power Apps, Power Virtual Agent, Power Pages, Power BI)

microsoft365Old.title: Microsoft 365 – Previous version
microsoft365Old.description: A course in the older version of Microsoft 365.

personalLetter.title: Personal Letter
personalLetter.paragraph2: I am very interested in the opportunity to work as a frontend developer with your company. My passion for web development and technology drives me to constantly grow and learn new things in areas like React, Angular, JavaScript, and CSS.
personalLetter.paragraph3: In addition to frontend, I also have basic knowledge of backend development, including Express.js and SQL, which gives me a broader understanding of the entire development process. I enjoy working with both frontend and backend to create efficient and scalable solutions.
personalLetter.paragraph4: I am a goal-oriented and problem-solving person who enjoys working independently as well as in a team. I always strive to create user-friendly and effective interfaces that enhance the user experience.
personalLetter.paragraph5: With my strong work ethic and ability to quickly learn new technologies, I am confident that I can contribute positively to your team and projects. I like to take initiative and see challenges as opportunities to grow and improve.
personalLetter.paragraph6: Thank you for taking the time to read my letter. I look forward to the opportunity to show what I can contribute and to grow together with you.
